item.description:
An event for Minilympic teams only. Please do not RSVP unless you are registered in the Minilympics roster.

This event will be an elimination style tournament. Each round, player(s) with the lowest score will be eliminated until we have a winner or winners.

This event is worth 20 points for 1st place, 15 points for 2nd place and 10 points for 3rd place. All teams will receive 5 points for participating.

 

The Game: Wizard is the perfect card game mashup to test players of the Salem Board Games Group.  It combines elements of trick-taking games and trump suits (such as Hearts and Whist) with elements of bluffing and gambling found in casino games, all of which can be found often brought to the table in this group.

Tournament will run from 7pm to 10pm for 10 players.  If you wish to participate as a spectator, please say so in the comments and we will have room on a first come, first serve basis for 6 people.

 

*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***
Did you know? (A Tribute to Gaming around the World):

If you get stuck with the Queen of Spades in the game of Hearts, thank the French.  France popularized the four suits of hearts, diamonds, spades, and clubs in the 15th century and introduced Queen cards in the 17th century.  Thus, the official term for the Bicycle decks commonly played with today is 'a French deck'.
